title: Product Manager (m/f/x) - Korean/English - ISG Personalmanagement
subtitle: Wien, W
body:
Our Customer is a well-known company and global leader in his industrial sector. High levels of innovation as well as global presence are to be mentioned as the key factors for continuous success.

For the expansion of the team in Vienna we are searching for an analytical and competent person at the earliest date possible for the following position:

Product Manager (m/f/x) - Korean/English

Main tasks:
  • Collaborating closely with the Headquarters, Sales and Production
  • Demand Management, Forecasts and Reporting
  • Price and Profit Management
  • Conducting market research and competitive analysis
  • Planning and executing measures to establish a long-term Customer Retention
  • Using analytics to consistently track and improve performance indicators
Requirements:
  • Professional experience in the field of Product Management, Demand Planning, Logistics, Financial Planning or similar
  • Native level of Korean and very good English skills; German as a plus
  • High command in MS Excel
  • Result-driven person with assertiveness and a high affinity to work with numbers
  • Hard working, professional and well-organised
Our offer:
  • An international working environment
  • A long-term employment
  • Attractive fringe benefits
  • Easily accessible office via public transport
  • An annual gross salary of € 60.000,-- depending on your qualifications - adjustment to match your qualification and experience is possible, plus company car.
If you are the highly motivated individual we are looking for, then please send your application preferrably via our ISG-Karriereportal by using the reference number 76.147.
